item.title: BananaFish
item.description: Banana Fish’s manga is said to be one of the most influential mangas in Japan. Since starting to watch this show, I understand why it was so impactful and well received. Good plot and blazing hot action scenes, Banana Fish will have something for almost everyone. The story is about Gang Wars in 2000s New York. You can see how much studio MAPPA has dedicated in this show. With neon colors and superb outfit designs, this anime will also serve as a wardrobe guide for guys.
